message: I had an idea to do a translated chat system for people wanting to speak to each other who speak different languages. What do you thing? http://oim.ae/chatdemo
Seems to be nice, would make more sense to do some Twtitter/Convore/Quora… integration...
Currently it works with facebook. the future intent is to make the user abstract and route conversations between any networks; facebook, twitter, quora, or ever your personal website.
I'm glad somebody's written it for the world at large.

I actually wrote this years ago for a customer.  They have international collaboration, and they'd already bought systransoft's campus translation server, and were using some horrible chat software as a client for the fairly decent OpenFire chat server.
I basically rewrote the client and it just bounced all the messages to systran first and then actually translated inline.
Hi all...I'm Indonesian, and would love to have a translator...it's a nice idea...:-)
Thanks! you should signup for the free beta! www.oimae.com

As a pivot to this - I wonder if you could turn it into some kind of 1) chat roulette type thing or 2) a social network kind of thing where you could use it to meet/discover friends in other countries. I have virtually zero non-english speaking friends, and perhaps it would be interesting to meet and become friends with, say, some Chinese people?
I think this is a great idea. Do you have any metrics on the quality/readability of the translation?

Yup! that was part of the plan going forward for the free version. The app however will be more geared to business use. The future is to allow a business to signup, drop some basic code on to their page, and have translated chat as a service for their user base. But there will be some features such as what you are describing for free users.
tenho muitas dificuldade em falar o que penso em inglês
eu bato papo em outros idiomas
Fico feliz em saber que esse site podera ser util a voce. Sinto muito pela pagina que ocorreu o erro. Gostaria de saber onde voce clicou para encontrar o erro.
Gostaria de continuar a nos ajudar a testar esse novo website? Obrigada.
